summary: A tough and honest police officer wages a one-man war against terrorists and a corrupt politician who have planned to assassinate the chief minister of the state.
cast: Aamir Khan|Mamta Kulkarni|Paresh Rawal|Avtar Gill|Mushtaq Khan|Aparajita|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Raza Murad|Asrani|Kunickaa Sadanand|Mukesh Rishi|Satish Shah|Ashish Vidyarthi|Puneet Issar|Abhimanyyu Abhimanyu|Haidar Ali|Daya Shankar Pandey|Jaya Mathur
keywords: man wears an undershirt|woman murders a woman|assassination attempt|barefoot male|terrorist
title: Baazi
